Description: Book of the Dead of Userhat; frame 6; full colour vignettes; red and blue cornice at top; cursive Hieroglyphic text in red and black ink; yellow borders.
Curator's comments: Published: Lucarelli, Rita. 2015. The inhabitants of the Fourteenth Hill of Spell 149 of the Book of the Dead. In Morenz, Ludwig D. and Amr El Hawary (eds). Weitergabe: Festschrift für die Ägyptologin Ursula Rößler-Köhler zum 65. Geburtstag, 275-291. Weisbaden: Harrassowitz.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (274)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (133548) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/133548)
